text.section:
Sec. 2-333. Conducting of proceedings; status of "agency."
All proceedings of the Charter Review Commission shall be conducted in accordance with the Government-in-the Sunshine Law, Section 286.011, Florida Statutes, and the Citizens' Bill of Rights of the Miami-Dade County Home Rule Charter. The Panel shall be deemed an "agency" for the purpose of compliance with the Public Records Law, Chapter 119, Florida Statutes.
